::Feline::

She ran down the corridoors and past the bridge.
Transforming into leapord mode, she ran up to Zardus and stood next 
to him. "You rang?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer/Zardus::
> 
> DevilDuer didn't need to be told twice. He jumps to the side, 
rolling 
> out of Rage's way and firing his stun gun at her again, but this 
time 
> the beam was slightly weaker.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zardus growls, rising into the air as he activates his 
jetpack. "I'm 
> at the entrance," he replies to Feline, "There is a big bot here, 
and 
> a group of bots on the way."
> 
> Zardus takes careful aim, firing a shot at Rage's head.
> 
> 
>

throwing
